text:
Hello,

I can't find any endpoint to list marketing events id, anybody get the good way to get them ?

Hello everyone, someone can help if a doubt for one API, in my search, i got this API endpoint mention enroll contacts into a workflow (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/add_contact?_ga=2.134384054.610567886.1695739191-1932056493.1695739191&_gl=1*1cleu3r*_ga*MTkzMjA1NjQ5My4xNjk1NzM5MTkx*_ga_LXTM6CQ0XK*MTY5NTczOTIyNS4xLjEuMTY5NTczOTU3Mi42MC4wLjA><https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/add_contact?_ga=2.134384054.610567886.1695739191-1932056493.1695739191&_gl=1*1cleu3r*_ga*MTkzMjA1NjQ5My4xNjk1NzM5MTkx*_ga_LXTM6CQ0XK*MTY5NTczOTIyNS4xLjEuMTY5NTczOTU3Mi42MC4wLjA.|.>)

and, after that i search one api to enroll deals into a workflow, but i don`t have success, so someone knows something about?
